rules_text: Mill four cards, then return a creature or enchantment card from your graveyard to you hand. You gain 3 life.
notes:
“There is comfort in knowing that the music of our future is already written, played on the strings of fate, plucked by divine hands.”
—Ophasma, oracle of Klothys


Mana ramp (usually fetching land, but sometimes an Aura)
alt art: Nathan Hale
